page.title: 10Housing in Kirkby
page.content: Kirkby is a relatively new town. Therefore, most of the houses are quite modern. In our block the majority of houses are rented accomodation, being either council houses or flats. There is less home ownership in this area. Opposite our school there are several blocks of high flats . Around the station there are some new housing estates and the houses on them are semi-detached. There are also detatched houses, bungalows and maisonettes. There are some estates which are about a 100 years old. They remind us of what Kirkby must have been like before it was developed.
